verses.roman:
kāli haite tumi yei mṛgādi māribā
prathamei māribā, ardha-mārā nā karibā"

synonyms: kāli haite—from tomorrow; tumi—you; yei—whatever; mṛga-ādi—animals; māribā—you will kill; prathamei māribā—kill them in the beginning; ardha-mārā—half-killing; nā karibā—do not do.
translation: " 'I beg you that from this day on you will kill animals completely and not leave them half-dead.'
